verbs.description: Alice Marie Johnson [V: has] been released from federal prison hours after her life sentence was commuted by President Donald Trump .
Alice Marie Johnson has [V: been] released from federal prison hours after her life sentence was commuted by President Donald Trump .
[ARG1: Alice Marie Johnson] has been [V: released] [ARG2: from federal prison] [ARGM-TMP: hours after her life sentence was commuted by President Donald Trump] .
Alice Marie Johnson has been released from federal prison hours after her life sentence [V: was] commuted by President Donald Trump .
Alice Marie Johnson has been released from federal prison hours after [ARG1: her life sentence] was [V: commuted] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] .
